alert.note: Alert for Charleston; Dorchester; Tidal Berkeley (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 22 at 1:47AM EST until January 22 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Minor snow and sleet accumulations and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Tidal Berkeley, Dorchester and Charleston Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A mix of sleet and freezing rain will persist through the overnight hours. This will result in some minor accumulation and ice accumulation, especially on elevated surfaces.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
